Description

Class that is responsible for changing sets

Class that is responsible for letting user know that his answer was correct

Class that keeps track on current score

Class that is responsible for showing credits

Class that is just custom exception, used in: StringOperations

Class responsible for returning data from database

Class that is responsible for showing questions about date

Class that is responsible for deleting tables from the DB

Class that is responsible for deleting questions from the DB

Class that is responsible for deleting tables from the DB

Class that deletes questions

Class that is responsible for allowing user to change password/login

Class that writes into different file (errors.txt) classes that thrown ExceptionUI

UI for showing errors
FinalScore
Class that is responsible for delaying act of showing user his score to prevent from
to early initialisation of actual score which may not be right

Class responsible for letting program know info about how many records are in th DB and what is the highest 'id'

Class that is responsible for letting user know that his answer was incorrect
It also shows what answer was expected

Class that is responsible for showing info about current set

Class responsible for checking if login/password is correct

Class that stores info about tables in DB

Class that extracts answers and questions from DB
